Lady Hawk laughs at Repressors statement. "And your mentality is 
likely to offline us all." she knew what would happen if he fired a 
missle in such small quarters. "Your missle would destroy the control 
system in this shuttle and send us all plumetting to our ends. except 
that the missle would have destroyed Najah and I first."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Repressor::
> 
> Repressor steps into the shuttle after Lady Hawk, the hatch closing 
> behind him. He frowns as she retaliates to Najah's insult, knowing 
> that this could quickly go overboard.
> 
> "And a missile always wins against a bot, especially if its shot 
> nearly from point-blank range, so stop arguing."
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > "Look you lawer,(You thought the parrot insult was good.) don't 
even 
> think
> > about killing me because in the grand scheme of things a hawk 
always 
> wins
> > over a snake." Lady Hawk grinned a poker face smile so she 
wouldn't 
> show
> > Najah anything by her expression. she was already hot, tired, and 
> belittled
> > in front of the alliance, to say she was in a bad mood would be an
> > understatement.
> > 
> > Listening to Repressor only added to her humiliation. Two bots 
that 
> were
> > getting on her nerves waited for a ride. It finally arrived and 
Lady 
> Hawk
> > stepped inside. She wanted to scream but knew that it would do her
